tracks.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
tracks.description: A legendary rock anthem by Queen, known for its operatic elements and epic structure.

tracks.title: Hotel California
tracks.description: An iconic rock song by the Eagles, featuring intricate guitar work and a captivating story.

tracks.title: Shape of You
tracks.description: A popular pop track by Ed Sheeran, known for its catchy melody and romantic lyrics.

tracks.title: Boogie Wonderland
tracks.description: A disco classic by Earth, Wind & Fire, featuring energetic grooves and infectious rhythm.

tracks.title: Smooth
tracks.description: A collaboration between Santana and Rob Thomas, fusing rock and Latin influences into a smooth, catchy tune.

tracks.title: Rolling in the Deep
tracks.description: A soulful pop ballad by Adele, known for its powerful vocals and emotional depth.

tracks.title: Sweet Child o' Mine
tracks.description: An iconic rock anthem by Guns N' Roses, featuring a memorable guitar riff and soaring vocals.

tracks.title: Billie Jean
tracks.description: A signature song by Michael Jackson, known for its infectious beat and captivating dance moves.

tracks.title: Boys Don't Cry
tracks.description: A classic alternative rock track by The Cure, expressing vulnerability and raw emotions.

tracks.title: Stairway to Heaven
tracks.description: An epic rock ballad by Led Zeppelin, known for its intricate guitar work and mystical lyrics.

tracks.title: Hey Jude
tracks.description: A timeless rock anthem by The Beatles, featuring sing-along choruses and uplifting messages.

tracks.title: Hotline Bling
tracks.description: A popular hip-hop track by Drake, known for its catchy melodies and memorable dance moves.

tracks.title: Purple Rain
tracks.description: An iconic pop ballad by Prince, showcasing his unique blend of rock, pop, and R&B.

tracks.title: Imagine
tracks.description: A heartfelt anthem by John Lennon, inspiring listeners to envision a world of peace and harmony.

tracks.title: Smells Like Teen Spirit
tracks.description: A defining grunge rock track by Nirvana, capturing the angst and disillusionment of a generation.
